short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Feed Odin a vegetarian diet on Board Game Arena.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Play the boardgame "A Feast for Odin" on Board Game Arena, but with delicious vegetarian options!

I've tried to replace all images and text, but if you find any I missed please let me know.

Changes:

* Whaling -> Kelping
* skin and bones -> salt
* whale meat -> kelp
* hide -> torch
* game meat -> beetroot soup
* fur -> rope
* stockfish -> porridge
* salt meat -> bread
